Classes
Class
Description
AIController
AIController handles the AI chat screen where users can interact with a chatbot.
APIHandler
Utility class responsible for handling API interactions with OpenAI.
DatabaseManager
Singleton class responsible for managing database connections and initialization.
DatabaseManagerTest
 
ErrorHandler
Utility class for displaying alert dialogs and logging errors.
LoginController
Controller class responsible for handling the login screen.
Main
Entry point of the JavaFX application.
MainController
MainController handles the main user dashboard after login.
PasswordHasher
Utility class for securely hashing passwords using SHA-256 algorithm.
PasswordHasherTest
 
Question
Represents a quiz question including its text, options, and correct answers.
QuestionController
Controller responsible for managing quizzes and questions.
QuestionTest
 
Quiz
Represents a quiz that contains a list of questions and a quiz name.
QuizDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing quizzes, questions, and options in the database.
QuizTest
 
QuizzesController
Controller class for handling quiz interactions for student users.
RegisterController
Controller for the registration screen.
User
Represents a user in the system with authentication and role information.
UserDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing user authentication and registration.
UserDAOTest
 
UserFactory
A simple factory class to create User instances.
UserTest

Utility class for validating user input such as email and password.
